mapper.update: update carinfo set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seat = #{seat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gas = #{gas,jdbcType=REAL}, rent = #{rent,jdbcType=REAL}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outdate = #{outdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adddate = #{adddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, type, color, seat, gas, rent, user_id, outdate, adddate, img from carinfo
select * from carinfo where type like concat('%',#{type},'%')
